```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)

ts_col <- "#b5c948"
tn <- readr::read_rds("data/cleaned/tn.rds")
tn_data <- tn$data

og <- readr::read_rds("data/cleaned/og.rds")
og_data <- og$data
og_data <- og_data %>% 
  mutate(anzahl_insg = anzahl_tn + anzahl_ma_leitung)

```
